statements: UPDATE course_content SET course_name = 'New Course Name', video_url = 'new_video_url.mp4' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE course_content SET interactive_modules = '{"module1": true, "module2": false}' WHERE course_id = 2;
UPDATE course_content SET course_name='Advanced Math' WHERE course_id=1
UPDATE course_content SET video_url='https://example.com/video' WHERE course_id=2
UPDATE courses SET course_name='Python Basics', course_description='Learn the basics of Python programming language' WHERE course_id=1;
UPDATE modules SET module_name='Introduction to Python', module_content='Python Basics Module', module_type='Text', module_course_id=1 WHERE module_id=1;
UPDATE courses SET course_name = 'Advanced Python Programming', course_description = 'In-depth study of Python programming concepts and advanced features' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE modules SET module_content = 'Machine Learning algorithms and implementations' WHERE module_name = 'ML Basics';
UPDATE videos SET title = 'Updated Video Title', duration = 120 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE pdfs SET size = 500, file_url = 'https://example.com/new_file.pdf' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE videos SET title = 'New Title', duration = 120 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE interactive_modules SET content = '{"lesson": "Introduction to SQL"}' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE videos SET title = 'Introduction to SQL Management' WHERE video_id = 1
UPDATE pdfs SET size = 2000, title = 'Advanced SQL Concepts' WHERE pdf_id = 2
UPDATE videos SET duration = 120 WHERE video_id = 1;
UPDATE pdfs SET size = 500 WHERE pdf_id = 3;
UPDATE course_materials SET title = 'New Introduction to Physics' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE videos SET title = 'Advanced Calculus Techniques' WHERE course_id = 201;
UPDATE course_materials SET title = 'Introduction to SQL' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE modules SET content = 'In this module, we will cover the basics of SQL queries and data manipulation.' WHERE course_id = 1 AND module_id = 3;
